body: Add option to begin a new duel directly from the deck editor using whatever deck is currently being edited.
author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
title: Start a new duel from the deck editor
content:
_From [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/) on July 28, 2014 19:04:09_

Add option to begin a new duel directly from the deck editor using whatever deck is currently being edited.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=629_
